desc: Here at Celtic Herbal, we create natural artisan products for skin, bath, baby and home. Handmade in our Welsh workshops using nature's finest ingredients for feel good relaxation and indulgence. Our products are cruelty free, and are free from nasties such as sulphates, parabens or SLS. Made in Conwy, North Wales.

layout.text: Celebrate every occasion with our brand new range of greeting cards. Perfectly paired with our gifting range to make sending your loved ones a meaningful present even easier.
